title: Some champions really need to be permanently banned from URF
body: What are you even supposed to do against Jayce?

replies.body: {{champion:61}} is busted and i main her reeee
i only see yi as a problem like once he start snowballing his unstoppable and that just his q

The problem of disabling the best champions is that the next best immediately take their place. It doesn't take people long to figure out tiers hell we knew most of the broken champions after about 2 days of original urf. All you would be doing is just changing places.

> [{quoted}](name=GladiatorOrphans,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5JGGrdkp,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-06-28T00:15:05.836+0000)
>
> The problem of disabling the best champions is that the next best immediately take their place. It doesn't take people long to figure out tiers hell we knew most of the broken champions after about 2 days of original urf. All you would be doing is just changing places.

That's not as true for URF as it is for regular games.  Champions need to be disabled in URF for specific reasons.  There will always be a strongest, but they won't be as bullshit to deal with as the true top tier.

> [{quoted}](name=Wanfear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5JGGrdkp,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-06-28T00:49:27.506+0000)
>
> That's not as true for URF as it is for regular games.  Champions need to be disabled in URF for specific reasons.  There will always be a strongest, but they won't be as bullshit to deal with as the true top tier.

It's true for literally any game where you can establish a meta. As long as math exist we are going to figure out who is the best quickly. We only see the current lineup as "bullshit" because they are the strongest. The next group would just be the new bullshit.

{{champion:84}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:86}} all the champs i think should be disabled

{{champion:29}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:77}} champs that should be disabled because urf doesn't benefit them very well.

Zed Jax Fiora Wukong Fizz Garen Tryndamere vladimir Karthus (not because it's op but using zhonya every 3s is boring) <-- at least this.
Fiddle kai'sa nidalee jayce shaco maokai syndra xayah nami <- could be since boring but not at all op.
For whatever reason Mao actually seems really tame now.

> [{quoted}](name=Z3Sleeper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5JGGrdkp,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-06-27T20:26:10.275+0000)
>
> For whatever reason Mao actually seems really tame now.

around the time of winter arurf maokai was actually tanky and true damage wasn't something everyone could get for free so if he built full tank and facerolled during a teamfight he basically took 0 damage, now since people can blow him up unless he evades stuff with his w he's not as strong
Chogath is worse. Thousands of true damage, infinitely scaling stacks, and ridiculous silence spam.
Your going to talk about busted ArUrf champs and not mention our lord Garen and him building any items and being able to 1 shot people.

Jayce
Fizz
Lulu
Ashe
Jax
Sivir
Tryndamere

I can go forever

>
> Ashe? Sivir?

Prob because of the multiple qâ€™s and spell shields
you engage him with anyone that has a gapcloser or any form of cc since his only escape is his hammer e
But he won't engage you. He will spam his Q from afar
have someone flank him then its not like theres just 1 lane in the game instead of a jg that connects everything
